price: (25) Say, "You will not be asked about what we committed, and we will not be asked about what you do."
arabic: قُل لَّا تُسۡـَٔلُونَ عَمَّآ أَجۡرَمۡنَا وَلَا نُسۡـَٔلُ عَمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qul lā tus'alūna ʿammā ajramnā walā nus'alu ʿammā taʿmalūna
